mapper.select: select rownum, b.board_no, b.product_id, b.title, b.content, to_char(b.regdate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') regdate, to_char(b.upddate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') upddate, count(r.reply_no) replycnt from tbl_board b left join tbl_reply r on b.board_no = r.board_no where b.board_category_cd = 202 group by rownum, b.board_no, b.product_id, b.title, b.content, to_char(b.regdate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss'), to_char(b.upddate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss')
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board values (seq_board_no.nextval, #{member_no}, #{board_category_cd}, #{product_id}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, sysdate)
